text: I know I m going to kill myself soon but I don t want my dog to be depressed when I m gone I ve already come to terms with the fact that I m going to die by overdosing on fentanyl  It s my drug of choice anyways so I m at peace with the decision  I m losing my battle  My son passed away last year when he was just   days old and he was my only purpose in life  I can t go on much longer  I miss my baby boy so much  My heart can t handle all this pain  My boyfriend has been telling me that I need to move on  He gets upset at me when I cry  He gets upset at me when I get angry at him for telling me to move on  That s the worst thing you can say to a bereaved mother  Apparently my pain is a burden for him  He has told me this  He doesn t know that I ve been cutting my arms  thighs  and face  He thinks it s cat scratches  He doesn t know that I ve been punching and hitting my face and my whole body  That I ve been choking myself and ripping my hair out  I have no family either  All I have is my sweet pitbull Fiona  and the thought of me not being there with her when I m dead makes me cry my eyes out  I tell myself that I should at least wait until after she passes away  that way I can spread her ashes on my baby boy s grave  But it s getting harder and harder to get out of bed or leave the house  But I only do this so my boyfriend doesn t get mad at me  I don t know where I m getting with this  Maybe some comfort from others on here  But I feel like nobody can even begin to fathom my pain and suffering
summary: Mother-of-one wants to kill herself but she doesn't want her dog to be depressed when she's gone. Her son passed away last year. She has no family and she has a pitbull Fiona. She wants to wait until after Fiona dies so she can spread her ashes on her son's grave.

text: Farewell  I think Some might remember that last night I made a post saying I was going to attempt suicide that night  and that if I posted afterwards I survived  Well  I counted my chickens too early  and I had to postpone it until tonight  which is why I promptly deleted the thread  In the next   hours  I will be attempting suicide  and I ve thought it all through at this point  I m about to finish my note and I have the means to end everything  I feel more free today than I have in a long time knowing that I can finally rest  That s kind of ironic  isn t it  Feeling more alive than you have in recent memory because you ve got the means to stop being alive Anyway  I d like to thank all the wonderful people and mods on this page for being so supportive and for doing such a wonderful thing for the community  I ve never once had I bad experience on here  and I m certain that without SW I probably would have attempted sooner  I ve only been here a short time  but I appreciate all the kind words and help more than you guys can know  Unfortunately  kind words aren t enough to keep me around anymore  Again  if I survive  I ll respond with an update  If not   well  you know I hope you all make it out of your troubles and live happy lives  I was just too lazy and selfish to fix my problems  You all deserve to be happy Later  lads and ladettes  Have a good one
summary: Last night I made a post saying I was going to attempt suicide that night and that if I posted afterwards I survived. I deleted the thread and I will be attempting suicide in the next hours. I want to thank all the wonderful people and mods on this page for being supportive and for doing a wonderful thing for the community.

text: SavedSo I went to the parking deck I chose today and couldn t bring myself to do it because there were some kids nearby and I didn t want them to see me jump i then got the idea to go buy a camping knife and go to my favorite hiking trails and end things that way  I went off trail a ways near a group of dead trees and was ready to do it  I decided to turn my phone back on and message a few friends for a final goodbye  One I had already seen in person this morning and we talked and cried and hugged before we parted ways  That friend called and asked if I really wanted to do this and he d come get me  While I still have issues to get through I m really glad I didn t end things  Sitting in the ER now waiting to be admitted feeling much calmer
summary: A friend came to the ER to pick her up from the parking deck and take her to the hospital. She is in a better mood now. She still has issues to get through but she's glad she didn't end things.
cleaned: friend come pick parking deck hospital well mood issue glad not end thing

text: Of all the horrors in Pandora s box  hope was by far the most malevolent We dance like puppets on strings to the fickle manipulations of false hopes and impossible dreams  It drags us along entranced by the lie that tomorrow will be better  The destructive vice that we all partake in  hope
